results.title: Automatic process control
results.brief_description: Illustrates the advantages to be derived from applying automatic control to a process in a small chemical plant. The four modes of control are discussed: on/off; proportional; proportional with reset; proportional with reset and rate action. An application of instrumentation for continuous process control is explained.
results.description: Illustrates the advantages to be derived from applying automatic control to a process in a small chemical plant. results.title: Autistic Syndrome 1
results.creator_credit: Stichting Film and Wetenschap Universitaire Film
results.brief_description: Presents some aspects of psychotherapy in a three year old autistic girl during her first year of residential treatment. We see her with her twin sister and with her therapist. A year later the twin sisters are observed with interest focused on changes in behaviour. No other credits available.

results.title: Autism without tears
results.creator_credit: Joan M. Curtis and Mansfield Playschool
results.brief_description: Produced to help people understand the autistic child. The Mansfield Playschool is conducted during the Christmas period as a holiday and instructional camp for autistic children and their families. Simple demonstrations of work being done and the reason for the use of special techniques are included. Narrated by Dr Joan M. Curtis.

results.title: Autism : The Early Signs
results.brief_description: This video comes with an education kit produced by the Autistic Family Support Association. Together they promote the early detection and diagnosis of autism in young children. The video is a visual representation of the behavioural characteristics of autism, and, through three case studies, shows the difficulties arising from living with a child who appears normal but whose behaviour is disturbing. Most importantly, it stresses the role of parents, people working with young children and health professionals in picking up the first clues that a child may be autistic.

results.title: Australians at the Olympics
results.creator_credit: Edwin Morrisby, National Panasonic and Southern Latitude Films
results.brief_description: Based on the book by sports journalist Gary Lester, the program is hosted by Olympic Gold medal winner John Konrads. Covers Australian competitors in Olympics from Athens in 1896 to Moscow in 1980. Rare footage is seen and some interviews with Australian champions such as Betty Cuthbert, Hubert Opperman, Dawn Fraser and others.

results.title: Australian is a wide word
results.brief_description: Perhaps the most pertinent issue of this video is why some or many of us have difficulties defining the term “Australian”, particularly in describing ourselves. The title is the response of one person in the video to this issue.

results.title: Australian business number : the key to your business
results.brief_description: This video provides information about the new Australian Business Number (ABN) introduced with the Goods and Services Tax. It includes information on who should register and how to register for an ABN. Presented by Michael Caton.

results.title: Australian business achievers (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Shaun Brown, Ivor J. Davies, DECO Corporation and Training Media Services
results.brief_description: Profiles five high achieving Australian business people and their philosophies for success. Those profiled include; Rob Cartwright, Keith Williams, Jodee Rich, Guido Belgiorno and Sam Gance.
